import React from 'react'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import '../../App.css'; import './Pages.css'; export default function Achieving() { return (

Achieving Commitments and Delivering Enduring Value

CACI performed well in FY22 and results were in line with expectations. We met our goals in many key areas of growth and delivered on our financial commitments to our myriad customers and shareholders. Our continuous ability to deliver sustained, durable, long-term growth remains unmatched. We achieved solid results and exceeded our customers' evolving national security needs despite several headwinds, including ongoing uncertainty of a years-long pandemic, supply chain disruptions, the impacts of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine and our nation’s withdrawal from Afghanistan, and record global inflation.

We diligently strived to deliver consistent, high-value outcomes and differentiated technologies to our customers that are vital to enhancing their enterprise and mission needs.

As an industry leader in natural software development at scale, including the execution of two of the government’s largest Agile programs, we see growing customer interest and pipeline opportunities to leverage Agile software development, DevSecOps, and open architectures to enable application modernization.

From network modernization and leading Commercial Solutions for Classified (CSfC) capabilities to electronic warfare and growth in the increasingly important space domain, we generated exceptional value for our customers and shareholders. During the past year, CACI’s more than 22,000 dedicated employees rose above countless challenges to support vital customer missions. Because of our strong company culture, we are continuously recognized as the company where talented engineers, scientists, and innovators can build meaningful careers and see their work's impact by helping our customers shape the future of national security.

In FY22, CACI was named a 2022 Top Workplace USA and Top Technology Company on the national list administered by Energage for the second year in a row. CACI was also named a Fortune World’s Most Admired Company, the 11th time it has appeared on the list. And our national security technologies continue to win awards, such as the prestigious Gold Edison Award for the DarkBlue Intelligence Platform.

In FY23, CACI embarks on its 60th year in business. Our two founders started CACI with modest means, but what they lacked in resources they made up for in ingenuity, confidence, and tenacity. That spirit survives in our culture today and continues to drive our modern-day success. Our unique culture and vision for delivering modern national security technologies and world-class expertise have powered our 60-year evolution, and we will continue to deliver on our commitments, generate value, and invent the future for many more years to come.

Some of our highlights from FY22 include:

  • Generating more than $6.2 billion in revenue, representing a 2.6% year-over-year increase.
  • Winning $7.1 billion in contract awards, with 40% representing new business.
  • Adjusted EBITDA margin of 10.3%.
  • Robust cash flow of more than $695 million.
  • Acquiring ID Technologies, expanding our enterprise modernization and secure communications technologies, and SA Photonics, broadening our free-space optical communications expertise and technology.
); }
